https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/soRW3p4GlPphHiFkwbqYGrodQ5S.jpg An NRI and his wife decide to stay in his ancestral home, paying no heed to the warnings about ghosts. Soon, inexplicable occurrences cause him to call a psychiatrist to help solve the mystery. Bhool Bhulaiyaa
